import { useState } from "react"; import { data } from "../../data"; import "./works.scss"; export default function Works() { const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); const handleClick = (way) => { way === "left" ? setCurrentSlide(currentSlide > 0 ? currentSlide - 1 : 2) : setCurrentSlide(currentSlide < data.length - 1 ? currentSlide + 1 : 0); }; return (
{/*
{data.map((d) => (

{d.title}

{d.desc}

View the project!
))}
*/}
{data.map((d) => (

{d.title}

{d.desc}

Projects
))}
handleClick("left")} /> handleClick()} />
); }
